name: Snowy White Winter Trees Dashboard Theme
description: A monochromatic white winter theme for your Tumblr dashboard. Intended for use with option six of Greyscale Dashboard Icons by TakingCasualties, as shown. Looks best with the slim sidebar from the Xkit extension, also as shown. Full size screenshot here. Use my Transparent Christmas Logo for a little holiday flavor.
additional_info: I can't believe I have to say this, but due to repeated theft of my code after the unexpected popularity, DO NOT USE THIS THEME OR ANY OF MY OTHER THEMES AS A DERIVATIVE. DO NOT CHANGE IT, EDIT IT IN ANY WAY, OR USE BITS OF IT FOR ANYTHING OTHER THAN PERSONAL USE WITHOUT CREDITING ME AND LINKING TO THIS THEME, NO EXCEPTIONS. I use this site frequently and I WILL see that you've used it, and I will call you out. Please be respectful of people who put their time and effort into making nice themes for everyone to use, so that they feel comfortable enough posting more in the future. That's just basic human decency.
